title: FAB Foxfire Ahri (genderbent cosplay)

embed.description: Foxfire Ahri costume by D.I.S/C Photography on Cospix.net - Costume made in cooperation with Forever Dreaming Cosplay (https://www.facebook.com/ForeverDreamingCosplay). Go check them out! Outfit: Andrea K. Dumma Detailing, Wig, Ears: Charlene H. Harness & Tails: Charlene H. & Andrea K. Dumma & D.I.S/C Photography Armour: D.I.S/C Photography while under guidance of Andrea K.

body:
Hello everyone,

I thought I would finally share my cosplay as (male version of) Foxfire Ahri.

Photos were taken from Sakura-Con 2014 to ALA 2015. The cosplay was made by Forever Dreaming Cosplay while I made the armour pieces while under their direction. More details are in the Cospix.net link.

On that note, raise your tails and hopefully see you on the Fields of Justice.

replies.body:
Your tails are so floofy! :3 

Nicely done!

Thank you~ and yes, it's all about dem tails.

It's so fluffy, I'm gonna (not) feed. ha ha ha ha
